statements: SELECT * FROM pricing_history ORDER BY date DESC, price ASC;
SELECT vendor_id, price FROM pricing_history WHERE performance_metric > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM pricing_history WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT MIN(price) AS min_price, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM pricing_history;
SELECT DISTINCT vendor_id FROM pricing_history;
SELECT * FROM pricing_history WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM pricing_history GROUP BY vendor_id HAVING AVG(price) > 200;
SELECT vendor_id, SUM(performance_metric) AS total_metric FROM pricing_history WHERE date = '2022-01-01' GROUP BY vendor_id;
SELECT vendor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM pricing_history WHERE performance_metric > 0.8;
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM pricing_history;
SELECT * FROM pricing_history WHERE vendor_id = 'VENDOR1';
SELECT product_id, price FROM pricing_history WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, date FROM pricing_history WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM pricing_history;
SELECT vendor_id, SUM(sales_volume) AS total_sales FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY vendor_id ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_history WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(sales_volume) AS total_sales FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_sales > 1000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY vendor_id HAVING avg_rating > 4.5;
SELECT vendor_id, product_id, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM pricing_history GROUP BY vendor_id, product_id ORDER BY vendor_id, max_price DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) AS unique_products FROM pricing_history GROUP BY vendor_id HAVING unique_products >= 5 ORDER BY unique_products DESC;
SELECT id, vendor_id, price, date FROM PricingHistory LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM VendorMetrics ORDER BY performance_rating DESC
SELECT vendor_id, decision_date, decision_reason FROM ProcurementDecisions WHERE vendor_id = 1
SELECT product_id, vendor_id, price FROM PricingHistory WHERE date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT vendor_id, performance_rating, delivery_speed FROM VendorMetrics WHERE customer_satisfaction > 80
SELECT * FROM PricingHistory ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT vendor_id, COUNT(product_id) AS products_count FROM PricingHistory GROUP BY vendor_id HAVING products_count > 5
SELECT p.* FROM PricingHistory p JOIN VendorMetrics vm ON p.vendor_id = vm.vendor_id WHERE vm.performance_rating > 80
SELECT p.id, p.price, pm.performance_rating FROM PricingHistory p LEFT JOIN VendorMetrics pm ON p.vendor_id = pm.vendor_id ORDER BY price DESC, pm.performance_rating DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_vendors FROM VendorMetrics vm JOIN ProcurementDecisions pd ON vm.vendor_id = pd.vendor_id WHERE pd.decision_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_location DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT AVG(revenue) AS average_revenue, MAX(sales_volume) AS max_sales_volume FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM pricing_history WHERE price_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM vendors WHERE vendor_location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, product_category, price FROM products WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY product_name DESC;

SELECT vendor_name, product_name, price, revenue FROM vendors INNER JOIN products ON vendors.vendor_id = products.vendor_id INNER JOIN performance_metrics ON products.product_id = performance_metrics.product_id WHERE sales_volume > 1000;
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM vendors LEFT JOIN products ON vendors.vendor_id = products.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name HAVING COUNT(product_id) > 5;

SELECT vendor_name, product_category, price, price_date FROM vendors LEFT JOIN products ON vendors.vendor_id = products.vendor_id LEFT JOIN pricing_history ON products.product_id = pricing_history.product_id WHERE price < 50 AND price_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY vendor_name, product_category ASC;
SELECT * FROM VendorInfo LIMIT 5;
SELECT vendor_name, location FROM VendorInfo ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM ProductDetails WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT vendor_name, location FROM VendorInfo WHERE location = 'USA' OR location = 'Canada';
SELECT vendor_name, performance_score FROM VendorMetrics WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT vendor_name, location FROM VendorInfo WHERE vendor_id = 123;
SELECT product_name, category, product_id FROM ProductDetails WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT vendor_id, performance_score, delivery_time FROM VendorMetrics WHERE performance_score > 90 ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT date, price FROM PricingHistory WHERE product_id = 567 AND price < 100 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT vendor_id, decision_date, decision_reason FROM ProcurementDecisions WHERE vendor_id = 456 AND decision_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
